lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • How are you? - A friendly question to ask about someone's well-being.
  • Good morning/afternoon/evening! - Time-specific greetings to use throughout the day.
  • Nice to meet you! - A polite phrase used when meeting someone for the first time.
  • Goodbye! - A way to say farewell when parting ways.

items.en: are you coming to the party?
items.explanation_en: This question asks if someone will attend a social gathering.
This question inquires about someone's activities from the previous day.

items.en: will you help me with this?
items.explanation_en: This question asks if someone will assist with a task.
This question asks about the frequency of someone's physical activity.
